formatted_address: 1 Cluny Rd, Singapore Botanic Gardens, Singapore 259569
name: Privé Botanic Gardens

reviews.text:
Nice place to have a drink and some food after a walk in the Botanic Gardens. Breakfast, lunch, dinner or just a coffee and a cake. To be surrounded by the lush greenery while eating is great. A rooster might pop by ;)
Both western and Asian food. Egg dishes, avocado sandwich, pasta, Hainanese Chicken rice and much more. You can sit both outdoors, or indoors where it’s cooler.
We ordered mushroom madness and margherita, found the crust of the pizza a bit hard and chewy, average. The avocado toast was pretty good. Service staff seem a little lost.
Such a lovely place in the heart of the Botanical Gardens! It has an amazing indoor play area for kids and is dog-friendly. The food is delicious, and the staff is warm and friendly!

A cozy and family-friendly dining spot with delicious food and a great atmosphere. The kids’ play area is a standout feature, keeping little ones entertained while parents relax and enjoy their meal.

Highly recommended for families!

Really Bad Experience for the Food served… I have been to Prive at other outlet and it was not bad, but this experience here is really scary till the point that you would be angry at the food

Chicken Burger was super dry and hard even for the meat, is stated Chicken Breast but trust me I was the hardest Chicken Breast my family haven eaten…

The Spaghetti (Pork Belly) was salted at its max level… very Salty…

We order the Crab cake Burger for the kids, the patty was not fully cooked and can still feel the coldness from fridge…

Only thing was the French fries… we like it a lot!!!!! That’s why u see the 1 Star here…
